sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' function MovieForm({onAdd}){ const [movieForm,setMovieForm]=useState({ name:'', desc:'', image:'', genre:'action' }) function handleChange(e){ setMovieForm({...movieForm,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) cosnole.log } function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() fetch("http://localhost:9292/movies",{ method:"POST", headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify( movieForm ) }) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data)=>{ onAdd(data) setMovieForm({...movieForm, name:'',desc:'',image:'',genre:'action'}) }) } return (

Create a Movie
